https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4Hr7Fcn8lxe6p8SDTmtP5I7ZVr5.jpg This is the tragic and true story of the abduction of Amber Hagerman. Her family and the community's efforts to find her and bring her kidnapper to justice prove to be a groundbreaking movement toward implementing a government-run tracking system. Amber's Story
